title: Ethereum a Force of Good
description:
Ethereum as a Force for Good
What does it mean for Ethereum to be a force of good? How can real-world applications of Ethereum such as RWA, DeFi, and Web3 social right current inequities in the world? What are key blockers that we need to overcome to bring Ethereum into the mainstream? In this talk, Stani will elaborate on how Ethereum is a positive force of change in the world.
